                if (typeof sessionStorage !== 'undefined') {

        var languageCode = 'mx';

        var console = console || { "log": function () { }, "error": function () { } };

        window.RouteInfo = {"DepartureAirportCode":null,"DepartureAirportName":null,"DepartureAirportNameShort":null,"DestinationAirportCode":null,"DestinationAirportName":null,"DestinationAirportNameShort":null,"NrOfSeats":0,"CurrentChangeBookingView":null,"HasUsaAirport":false,"IsRoundTrip":false,"IsInternational":false,"OutboundFlightKeys":[],"InboundFlightKeys":[]};

        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action) {

            try {
                ga('send', 'event', {
                    eventCategory: category,
                    eventAction: action
                });
            } catch (err) { }

            setTimeout(function () {
                if (link.target == "_blank") {
                    window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                } else {
                    document.location.href = link.href;
                }
            }, 100);
        }


    </script>

    <div id="tooManySelectedPassengers" class="modal fade" tabindex="-1" role="dialog">
        <div class="modal-dialog" role="document">
            <div class="modal-content">
                <div class="modal-body">
                    <h4>Al parecer quieres cotizar un viaje para más de 9 personas.<br> Por favor visita nuestra página de Atención a Grupos para recibir una mejor oferta y con beneficios adicionales.</h4>

    <script>
       function removeAccents(str) {
            var accents = 'ÀÁÂÃÄÅàáâãäåßÒÓÔÕÕÖØòóôõöøÈÉÊËèéêëðÇçÐÌÍÎÏìíîïÙÚÛÜùúûüÑñŠšŸÿýŽž';
            var accentsOut = "AAAAAAaaaaaaBOOOOOOOooooooEEEEeeeeeCcDIIIIiiiiUUUUuuuuNnSsYyyZz";
            str = str.split("");
            str.forEach(function(letter, index) {
                var i = accents.indexOf(letter);
                if (i !== -1) {
                    str[index] = accentsOut[i];
                }
            });
            return str.join("");
        }
    </script>

                    var flightHotelCriteria = new FlightCriteria.FlightAndHotel(hotelFlightSettings);

    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function () {
            setTimeout(function () {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='myflight']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                        },
                        controls: {
                            loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                            loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                            year: t.container.find('.year'),
                            month: t.container.find('.month'),
                            day: t.container.find('.day'),
                            bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='myflight']"
                        },
                        form: $("form[data-tab-id='myflight']")
                    };

                    t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                    t.myflightLogin.init();

                },
                100);


        });
    </script>

    <form data-tab-id="webcheckin" action="/MyBooking/SignIn?itemId=509&amp;RedirectToCheckInPage=0" method="POST" autocomplete="on" novalidate="novalidate">
        <div data-tab-id="webcheckin" class="criteriaBox login-box hidden">
            <div class="login-box_header">
                <style type="text/css">.va {
	text-align: justify;
}
</style>
<h2 style="margin: 0;font-size:18px;">WEB CHECK-IN</h2>
<span class="va">Ahora puedes documentar en línea en cualquier momento, l leves o no equipaje. Puedes hacerlo desde la comodidad de tu hogar u oficina desde 72 horas y hasta 4 horas antes de la salida de tu vuelo. </span>
            </div>

            <div class="login-box_error">
                <ul class="validation-container booking-login-validation hidden" data-tab-id="webcheckin">
                    <li></li>
                </ul>
            </div>

            <div class="login-box_form">

<script>
    $(function () {
        //var tabsmenu = new TabsMenu({
        //    tabscontainer: $("#flightCriteria #tabs-container"),
        //    boxes: $("#flightCriteria div.criteriaBox")
        //});
        //tabsmenu.init();
        $("#flightCriteria").show();
        var $flightCriteria = $('#flightcriteria-container');
        var $criteriaTabButton = $("#FlightAndHotelButton");
        var $flightAndHotelCriteria = $("#hotel-flightbox");
        var $NormalFlightCriteriaButton = $("#NormalFlightCriteriaButton");
        var $NormalFlightCriteriaButtonMobile = $("#NormalFlightCriteriaButtonMobile");
        var $criteriaTabButtonMobile = $("#FlightAndHotelButtonMobile");
        var showNormalFlightCriteria = true;

        var toggleCriteria = function () {
            $(".tab.flight").removeClass("activeTab");
            if (!showNormalFlightCriteria) {
                $flightCriteria.hide();
                if ($flightAndHotelCriteria.hasClass("hidden")) {
                    $flightAndHotelCriteria.removeClass("hidden");
                }
                $criteriaTabButton.addClass("activeTab");
                $flightAndHotelCriteria.show();
            } else {
                $flightAndHotelCriteria.hide();
                $flightCriteria.show();
                $NormalFlightCriteriaButton.addClass("activeTab");
            }
        };

        $(document).on("click", "#FlightAndHotelButton", function (event) {
            event.preventDefault();
            showNormalFlightCriteria = false;
            toggleCriteria();
        });

        $(document).on("click", "#NormalFlightCriteriaButton", function (event) {
            event.preventDefault();
            showNormalFlightCriteria = true;
            toggleCriteria();
        });

        $criteriaTabButtonMobile.click(function (event) {
            event.preventDefault();
            showNormalFlightCriteria = false;
            toggleCriteria();
            $('.navbar-toggle').click();
        });

        $NormalFlightCriteriaButtonMobile.click(function (event) {
            event.preventDefault();
            showNormalFlightCriteria = true;
            toggleCriteria();
            $('.navbar-toggle').click();
        });

        $(document).on("click", ".tab.flight, .tabcriteria a", function (event) {
            var $link = $(this);
            if ($link.attr("id") !== undefined) {
                var isMobile = $link.attr("id").indexOf("Mobile") !== -1;
                var id = isMobile ? $link.attr("id").replace("Mobile", "") : $link.attr("id");

                if ($("#" + id + "-criteriacontent").length > 0) {
                    event.preventDefault();

                    $flightCriteria.hide();
                    $flightAndHotelCriteria.hide();
                    $("div[id$='-criteriacontent']").hide();
                    $("#" + id + "-criteriacontent").show();
                    $(".tab.flight").removeClass("activeTab");
                    $link.addClass("activeTab");

                    if (isMobile) {
                        $('.navbar-toggle').click();
                    }

                } else {
                    $("div[id$='-criteriacontent']").hide();
                }
            }
        });
    });
</script>
        <div class="clear"></div>
    </div>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        (function ($) {
            $.fn.vivaSlide = function (options) {
                var settings = $.extend({
                    timeOut: 3000,
                    fx: "fade",
                    slides: "> div",
                    speed: 1000,
                    pager: '#' + $(this).get(0).id + ' .pager',
                    swipe: true,
                    swipeFx:"scrollHorz",
                    pauseOnHover: true
                }, options);

                var _this = $(this);
                var _slide = $('.slide', _this);
                var _captions = $('.promo-captions', _this);

                var slide = $(_slide).cycle(settings);
            }
        })(jQuery);
        $(document).ready(function () {
            $('#demoSlide').vivaSlide();
        });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function () {
            //$(".viva-carousel").on('init', function () {
            //    $(".content").removeAttr('style');
            //});
            $(".viva-carousel").on('ready.flickity', function () {
                $(".content").removeAttr('style');
            });
            $('.viva-carousel').flickity({
                pageDots: false,
                freeScroll: true,
                imagesLoaded: false,
                adaptiveHeight: true,
                contain: true,
                touchVerticalScroll: false,
                groupCells: 4,
                cellAlign: 0
            });

            $.each($(".viva-carousel").find('.flickity-button'), function () {
                var svg = $(this).find('.flickity-button-icon');
                $(svg).attr('style', 'visibility:hidden');
                if ($(this).hasClass('previous')) {
                    $(this).addClass('slick-prev');
                }
                else {
                    $(this).addClass('slick-next');
                }
            });
            $(".viva-carousel").on('dragStart.flickity', function( event, pointer ) {
                document.ontouchmove = function (e) {
                    e.preventDefault();
                }
            });
            $(".viva-carousel").on('dragEnd.flickity', function( event, pointer ) {
                document.ontouchmove = function (e) {
                    return true;
                }
            });

            //$(".viva-carousel").on('init', function () {
            //    $(".content").removeAttr('style');
            //});
            //$('.viva-carousel').slick({
            //    dots: false,
            //    infinite: false,
            //    arrows: true,
            //    slidesToShow: 5,
            //    slidesToScroll: 1,
            //    centerPadding: '20px',
            //    responsive: [{
            //        breakpoint: 768,
            //        settings: {
            //            arrows: false,
            //            centerMode: true,
            //            centerPadding: '20px',
            //            slidesToShow: 3
            //        }
            //    },
            //    {
            //        breakpoint: 480,
            //        settings: {
            //            arrows: false,
            //            centerMode: true,
            //            centerPadding: '40px',
            //            slidesToShow: 1
            //        }
            //    }
            //    ]
            //});
        });
    </script>

   <div _ngcontent-c4="" class="col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12"><br _ngcontent-c4=""></div>
   <div _ngcontent-c4="" class="ancillarie_card">
      <div _ngcontent-c4="" class="viva-card zoom-hover shadow-hover">
        <div _ngcontent-c4="" class="header">
            <figure _ngcontent-c4=""><img _ngcontent-c4="" alt="image-header" src="https://content.vivaaerobus.com/Upload-VB/home/block/Card_enViva_20190213.png"></figure>

<script>


/*------- Script, Change search button icon --------*/
$("a.criteriaSearchButton span").removeClass("vi-right-arrow");
$("a.criteriaSearchButton span").addClass("vi-search-2");

/*------- Script, Open these header element in new tab --------*/
/*--ESP--*/
$("li#AtenciónaClientes").find("a").attr("target","_blank");
$("li#Estatusdevuelos").find("a").attr("target","_blank");
/*--ENG--*/
$("li#Customerservice").find("a").attr("target","_blank");
$("li#FlightStatus").find("a").attr("target","_blank");


/*---------- Script, IBE Uppercase City -----------*/
setTimeout(function(){
    $("#flightCriteria .vb-flight-select-data__airports__airport--name span").each(function(){
        var destin = $(this).text();
        if (destin.indexOf("(") >= 0 && destin.indexOf(")") >= 0){
            var pdest=destin.substring((destin.indexOf("(")+1), (destin.indexOf(")")));
            var ndest=destin.replace(pdest,pdest.toUpperCase());
            //console.log(ndest);
            $(this).text(ndest);
        }
    });
}, 1500);

</script><style>

        transform:scale(0.7);

<script src="https://content.vivaaerobus.com/dist-vb/layout-a780d7aacf.js" type="text/javascript"></script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        moment.locale("es-MX");
    </script>


    

    <script type="text/javascript">
        window.ezy.availabilitySettings = {
            SeatingSelectionInBooking: true,
            SeatingSelectionInChangeBooking: true
        };

        if (!ezy.browserSupportChosen()) {
            $(".siteWrapper").addClass("mobile-device");
        }

        $(".navbar-toggle").click(function () {
            var closed = $("#mobile-menu").hasClass("in");
            if (closed) {
                $(this).find(".icon-bar").addClass('display-none');
                $(this).find(".icon-menu-cancel").removeClass('display-none');
            } else {
                $(this).find(".icon-bar").removeClass('display-none');
                $(this).find(".icon-menu-cancel").addClass('display-none');
            }
        });


        $(window).scroll(function() {
            if ($(this).scrollTop() === 0) {
                $(".headWrapper").removeClass("scrolled-shadow").removeClass("animated slideInDown");
            }
        else {
                $(".headWrapper").addClass("scrolled-shadow").addClass("animated slideInDown");
            }
        });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        window.EnableFlightSelectionOnFusionResponse = false;
        window.EnableFusionConsoleLogging = false;
    </script>

        <script>
            window.FusionDisabled = true;
        </script>


        <script type="text/javascript">
            window.OnGoogleSignInLoad = function () {
                window.GoogleLoginContainerIds = window.GoogleLoginContainerIds || [];

                $.each(window.GoogleLoginContainerIds, function (i, containerId) {

                    var buttonSettings = {
                        'scope': 'profile email',
                        'width': 254,
                        'height': 40,
                        'longtitle': true,
                        'theme': 'dark',
                        'onsuccess': window.VivaFan[containerId].handleGoogleLogin,
                        'onfailure': window.VivaFan[containerId].handleGoogleLoginFailure
                    };

                    window.gapi.signin2.render("my-signin2" + containerId, buttonSettings);
                });
            };
        </script>
        <script src="https://apis.google.com/js/platform.js?onload=OnGoogleSignInLoad" async="" defer="" gapi_processed="true"></script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var vivaFanModel = window.VivaFan["SidePanel"];
            
            vivaFanModel.LoggedIn = false;
            vivaFanModel.Mode = "Normal";
            vivaFanModel.FromUrl = "";
            vivaFanModel.userInfo = null;

            vivaFanModel.init({"InvalidLoginAttemptWithGmailText":"Ya existe una cuenta con ese correo electrónico. Por favor, verifica tu información o comunícate a nuestro Call Center para mayor información.","FailedToGetEmailFromFacebook":"We could not get your email from Facebook. Please check the given permissions and make sure your email is shared.","InvalidLoginAttemptWithFacebookText":"Ya existe una cuenta con ese correo electrónico. Por favor, verifica tu información o comunícate a nuestro Call Center para mayor información.","ServerErrorText":"Server Error"});

            ko.applyBindings(vivaFanModel, $("#VivaFanLoginPartSidePanel")[0]);

            if (vivaFanModel.LoggedIn && vivaFanModel.FromUrl) {
                vivaFanModel.showRedirectMessage(true);
                window.location.href = vivaFanModel.FromUrl;
            }
        });

        window.GoogleLoginContainerIds = window.GoogleLoginContainerIds || [];
        window.GoogleLoginContainerIds.push("SidePanel");

        window.ezy = window.ezy || {};
        window.ezy.InvalidEmailDomains = "guerillamail.de,guerillamail.info,guerillamail.net";
    </script>

            </div>
        </div>

    <script>
        $(function () {
            $(".close-viva-fan-side-panel").click(function () {
                $('.viva-fan-login-side__outer iframe').css("visibility", "hidden");
                $('.viva-fan-login-side__outer').animate({ width: 'toggle' }, 350, function () {
                     $('#viva-fan-login-side').hide();
                });
            });
            $(".close-viva-fan-welcome").click(function () {
                $('#viva-fan-welcome-message').fadeOut();
            });
        });
    </script>
